message: Let's start with a fair split, 60-40. Let's see if you like it!
I'll take a slightly larger share, but I'm willing to compromise!
I'm not sure I'm ready to give up 80. Can you meet me in the middle?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think I deserve a bit more. How about 55-45?
I'm not budging on the amount, but I'm willing to give you a smaller share of the smaller total value!
That's a pretty lopsided offer, Bob. I'm not comfortable with giving up 90% of the remaining value.
I'm willing to take a smaller share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of. 40-60 is my final offer.
